Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.1 Sārammaṇaduka » 10.1.3 Paccayavāra » 10.1.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.1.3.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Sārammaṇaduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
17.
2356Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
<< 10.1.3.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup10.1.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya >>
